metadata.title: CVE-2023-29458 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Duktape is an 3rd-party embeddable JavaScript engine, with a focus on portability and compact footprint. When adding too many values in valstack JavaScript will crash. This issue occurs due to bug in Duktape 2.6 which is an 3rd-party solution that we use.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
